cgcloud__Tactic_Condition_Creation_Defin.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Condition_Creation_Definition__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Condition_Creation_Defin.description: Holds the details of tactic condition creation definition.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_1__c.description: Defines the KPI definition used to provide additional information for the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_2__c.description: Defines the KPI definition used to provide additional information for the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_3__c.description: Defines the KPI definition used to provide additional information for the condition.

cgcloud__Allowed_Product_Levels__c.description: Defines the eligible product levels when determining automatically the product levels on condition generation.

cgcloud__Change_Rule__c.description: Determines the rule to handle past conditions.

cgcloud__Check_For_Duplicates__c.description: Defines whether the system reports generated internal conditions conflicting with pre existing conditions.

cgcloud__Maintenance__c.description: Defines the action on the conditions generated by the tactic.

cgcloud__Parent_TCCD__c.description: Used for the push process. If a promotion is pushed to the selected child accounts and has tactics with TCCDs, TCCDs are also created for the tactics of the child promotions based on the TCCDs of the parent tactic. This reference is used to identify the parent/source TCCD for the child TCCDs and is used if later on changes in the parent tactic are synced with the child tactics.

cgcloud__Product_Level__c.description: Defines the product group level at which the condition is generated.

cgcloud__Source_KPI_Definition__c.description: Defines the KPI definition which is used as the source for generating condition.

cgcloud__Tactic__c.description: Tactic for which the rule is defined.

cgcloud__Targets__c.description: Defines the targets to which the conditions are written.

cgcloud__Unique_Measure_Name__c.description: Contains unique concatenation of tactic Id and source KPI definition Editable Code
